basics.name: Marty Helmick
basics.summary: Experienced WordPress Developer with 13+ years of expertise building scalable, high-performance web solutions. Deeply skilled in custom theme and plugin development, Gutenberg block creation with React, REST API integrations, and performance optimization. Open Source contributor with impactful contributions to WordPress Core development.

work.name: Awesome Motive
work.summary: Lead developer for high-traffic marketing websites serving millions of users globally, with extensive experience in live event support and on-call operations.
highlights: Spearheaded development and maintenance of complex, high-traffic product marketing sites (AIOSEO, SEOBoost, LowFruits) serving 3+ million websites globally
Engineered WordPress editor blocks (Table of Contents, FAQ) using React, significantly improving content creation workflows and user engagement
Collaborated extensively with cross-functional teams including leadership, marketing, support, and development to deliver high-impact solutions
Implemented custom API endpoints and integrated services (Help Scout, DocsBot AI, Drip, Unchurn) enhancing customer support and retention strategies
Improved website performance and PageSpeed scores through strategic optimizations, including Cloudflare APO implementation
Provided technical guidance and mentorship to team members on development projects and modern WordPress practices
Enhanced user experience and conversion rates through iterative development of pricing pages, checkout flows, and WooCommerce integrations
Developed flexible WordPress solutions including custom post types, taxonomies, and Gutenberg block patterns
Championed modern WordPress development practices ensuring code quality, maintainability, and industry standards compliance

work.name: The Idea People
work.summary: Senior developer responsible for custom WordPress solutions for nationally recognized organizations.
highlights: Engineered and maintained custom WordPress websites for nationally recognized organizations ensuring scalability, security, and seamless user experiences
Developed custom WordPress themes and plugins to meet specific business requirements
Implemented advanced workflows with WooCommerce, ACF, Gravity Forms, and tailored admin interfaces
Led technical discussions, gathered project requirements, and developed implementation plans
Supervised development team members and provided technical mentorship

work.name: Diocese of Charlotte
work.summary: Lead developer managing web applications for multiple organizations with supervisory responsibilities.
highlights: Developed and maintained web applications for schools, churches, campaigns, and diocese-related agencies
Built custom WordPress solutions with strong emphasis on accessibility and user experience
Led technical discussions, gathered project requirements, and developed implementation plans
Managed complex information architecture through custom post types and taxonomies
Supervised assigned development staff and carried out supervisory responsibilities including training, performance management, and project direction

volunteer.summary: Open source contributor to WordPress core development.
highlights: Contributed to six major WordPress releases (5.0, 5.2, 5.3, 5.4, 5.6, 5.8) as Gutenberg Development Team Member
Actively engaged in discussions, PRs, and issue triage for WordPress core and Gutenberg editor
Developed custom PostCSS plugin using Node.js to optimize styling workflows for WordPress block editor
Advanced functionality and user experience of the WordPress block editor for millions of users

publications.name: PostCSS Editor Styles Plugin
publications.summary: Custom PostCSS plugin developed using Node.js to optimize styling workflows for WordPress block editor

references.name: Jane Smith
references.reference: Marty is an exceptional WordPress developer who consistently delivers high-quality solutions. His expertise in React and Gutenberg development significantly improved our content creation workflows.

references.name: John Doe
references.reference: I had the pleasure of working with Marty on several complex projects. His technical skills, attention to detail, and ability to mentor team members make him an invaluable asset to any development team.

projects.name: AIOSEO Marketing Site
projects.description: High-traffic marketing website for All in One SEO plugin trusted by 3+ million websites
highlights: Custom WordPress theme development
Advanced plugin functionality
Multi-lingual capabilities
API integrations for customer support and retention
Performance optimization achieving improved PageSpeed scores

projects.name: SEOBoost Marketing Site
projects.description: Complete marketing website development from concept to launch
highlights: Built using modern WordPress block theme architecture
Custom themes and plugins development
Drip integration for customer lifecycle management
Responsive design implementation
Performance-optimized for high-traffic usage

projects.name: WordPress Gutenberg Editor Blocks
projects.description: React-based WordPress editor blocks improving content creation workflows
highlights: Engineered Table of Contents and FAQ blocks using React
Significantly improved content creation workflows
Enhanced user engagement for millions of websites
Modern development practices implementation
